maqras.text: 37|22|(Phiraistasakalaka koraa ha’ba) ‘ekatraita karaa yalimasakalaka arau sihamtara sangi-sarathisakalaka arau se'iborako yiborara sihamte ibadata karaichila
37|23|allahara bahirae, arau sihamtaka jahannamara patha dekhuraa'i diya
37|24|‘arau sihamtaka rakhoraacona, niscaya sihamtaka prasna karaa ha’ba.
37|25|‘Ki ha’la tomalokara, tomaloke kiya ijane sijanara sahaya karaa na'i etiya’
37|26|prakrtate sihamta ha’ba aji atmasamarpanakarai.
37|27|Arau sihamte ijane sijanara mukha-makhi hai sodha-pocha karaiba
37|28|sihamte ka’ba, ‘niscaya tomaloke'i amara ocaralai sapata lai ahichila’.
37|29|Sihamte (netrsthaniya kaphirabilake) ka’ba, ‘baram tomaloke'i mumina nachila
37|30|‘arau tomalokara oparata amara kono kartrtba nachila; daraacalate tomaloke'i achila simalanghanakarai sampradaya.
37|31|‘Seye amara biraud'dhe amara pratipalakara katha satya hicape sabyasta haiche, niscaya ami sasti asbadana karaima.
37|32|‘Eteke amiye'i tomalokaka bibhraanta karaichilo, karana ami nije'o achilo bibhraanta’.
37|33|Tara pichata niscaya sihamta ataye se'idina sastita ansidara ha’ba.
37|34|Niscaya ami aparaadhibilakara lagata enekuraa acarane'i karao.
37|35|Sihamtaka yetiya koraa haichila, ‘allahara bahirae ana kono satya ilaha na'i’, tetiya sihamte ahankara karaichila.
37|36|Arau kaichila, ‘ami ejana unmada kabira kathata amara ilahasamuhaka barjana karaima neki’
37|37|baram te'om satya lai ahiche arau (bigata) raachulasakalako satya buli sbikara karaiche.
37|38|Niscaya tomaloke yantranadayaka sastira asbadanakarai haba
37|39|arau tomaloke yi karaichila kerala tarae'i pratiphala paba
37|40|kintu te'omloka nahaya, yisakala allahara ekanistha banda.
37|41|Te'omlokara babe ache nirdharaita raijikba (jiraika)
37|42|Phalamula; arau te'omloka ha’ba sanmanita
37|43|niyamaterae bharaa jannatata
37|44|mukha-mukhi hai asanata bahiba.
37|45|Te'omlokara carai'ophale ghurai ghurai paraibesana karaa ha’ba bisud'dha suraapurna patra
37|46|subhra ujjbala, yibora ha’ba panakarai sakalara babe susbadu.
37|47|Tata ksatikara eko nathakiba arau te'omloka e'iborara dbaraa matoraalo naha’ba.
37|48|Te'omlokara ocarata thakiba anata nayana, danara caku bisista (hurasakala).
37|49|Te'omloka yeniba acchadita kani.
37|50|Tara pichata te'omloke parasparae mukha-mukhi hai sodha-pocha karaiba.
37|51|Te'omlokara konoba'i ka’ba, ‘(prthiraita) mora ejana sangi achila
37|52|si kaichila, tumi'o sihamtara antarbhukta neki, yisakale bisbasa karae ye
37|53|‘ami yetiya mrtyubarana karaima arau ami mati o asthita parainata hama tetiya'o amaka pratiphala diya ha’bane’
37|54|allahe ka’ba, ‘tomaloke taka dekhiba bicaraa neki’
37|55|tara pichata te'om jumi caba arau taka dekha paba jahannamara madhyasthalata
37|56|te'om ka’ba, ‘allahara sapata! Tumito moka praaya dhbansahe karaichila
37|57|‘mora pratipalakara anugraha naha’le dekhuna mayo (jahannamata) upasthitakrta byaktisakalara antarbhukta ha’lohemtena.
37|58|(Yike naha'omka etiya) amara arau duna'i mrtyu nahaya
37|59|‘amara prathama mrtyura pichata arau amaka sasti'o diya nahaba!’
37|60|Niscaya e'itorae'i se'i mahasaphalata.
37|61|Enekuraa saphalatara babe'i amalakarai sakale amala karaa ucita
37|62|(koraacona) apyayanara babe e'iborae'i uttama ne yakkuma gacha uttama
37|63|niscaya ami yalimasakalara babe iyaka paraiksasbaraupa srsti karaicho
37|64|e'i gacha utpanna haya jahannamara talara paraa
37|65|iyara thopa haiche yeniba cayatanara mura
37|66|niscaya sihamte e'ito bhaksana karaiba arau se'itora dbaraa'i peta bharaaba.
37|67|Iyara pichato sihamtara babe thakiba utala panira misrana.
37|68|Tara pichata sihamtara pratyarartana ha’ba jahannamara ju'ira phale.
37|69|Niscaya sihamte sihamtara pitr-purausasakalaka pa'ichila pathabhrasta
37|70|tathapi'o sihamte sihamtara anusaranata drauta gati karaichila.
37|71|Arasye sihamtara purbe'o purbarartisakalara sarahabhaga manuhe'i bipathagami haichila
37|72|arasye ami sihamtara majato satarkakarai praerana karaichilo.
37|73|Eteke coraa, yisakalaka satarka karaa haichila, sihamtara parainama ki haichila
37|74|kintu allahara ekanistha bandasakalara katha sbatantra.
37|75|Arau arasye nuhe amaka ahbana karaichila, eteke (coraa) ami kimana uttamabharae samharai jana'ichilo
37|76|te'omka arau te'omra paraiyalabargaka ami mahasankatara paraa ud'dhara karaichilo.
37|77|Arau te'omra bansadhara sakalake'i ami arasista raakhichilo
37|78|arau ami parabartisakalara majata te'omra sukhyati raakhi dicho.
37|79|Samagra srstira majata nuhara prati santi barsita ha'omka.
37|80|Niscaya ami e'idarae'i satkarmasila sakalaka puraskrta karao.
37|81|Niscaya te'om achila amara mumina bandasakalara an'yatama.
37|82|Tara pichata ami anabilakaka duba'i maraichilo.
